page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT AND TRANSPORT
page.content: Most people who are not involved in {farming}work in towns particularly {Telford}and{Newport}although other towns such as{Shifnal, Brownhills, {Dudley, Ironbridge, Stafford, {Wellington, Ellesmere, Albrighton and {Cannock}as well as{Wolverhampton and {Birmingham }are places where employment is found. {Transport}is mainly by{car,}with a large number of families having two cars. Other means of transport are {buses}(which offer one service a week through the village),{trains}(the nearest station being Shifnal), {lorries, vans and bicycles.}Farming is the major local employment. Other jobs include accounts, insurance, nursing, shop assistants, civil engineers, building, power station worker, senior electrician, environmental health officer and teachers.
